message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. I believe it could greatly enhance your operations or personal life. Considering its quality and features, I would like to propose an initial price of $12000. Let me know if this aligns with your expectations or if you'd like to discuss further.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the quality and features of your product. Based on my research and budget considerations, I am willing to offer $9500 for the product.

Thank you for your interest in our product, Bob. I understand your position and respect your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your offer while still reflecting the value of our product, I would like to counterpropose a price of $10500. This allows us to maintain a fair valuation while making the product more accessible to you. Please let me know if this proposal works for you, or if you would like to discuss further.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I must respectfully decline. Given my budget constraints, I am unable to increase my offer above $10000. I hope this aligns with your considerations.

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. In light of your offer, I would like to present a counteroffer of $9800. This price reflects the value of the product while allowing for a reasonable compromise. I hope this proposal meets your expectations. Please let me know your thoughts.
